name: Volt
description: Volt is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With a sleek box-like body, button controls resembling a cat's face, and arms and legs designed in the shape of playful feline limbs, Volt is a unique and eye-catching creation. Its classic screen displays mesmerizing waveforms and patterns, reminiscent of the golden age of technology. Volt combines the charm of a cat with the functionality of an oscilloscope, making it a delightful companion for any tech enthusiast.
